string.text: Sardines "Pirate"
a Very tasty fish, caught in the Pacific ocean, and transported some stalkers to the exclusion zone. Shelf life 1.5 months.

the Bank of nuts with increased amounts of vitamins. They can be quickly filled and a bit to regain energy.

the Drink is called "Wild" because it contains alcohol. The drink contains 5% alcohol, and drugs, causing the release of adrenaline in the blood.
Olives

Biscuits
Quite nutritious, allowing long storage of the product, but they are not particularly satisfied.
the Chocolate "Alenka"

Delicious bar of milk chocolate with cream filling. An excellent remedy against bad mood.

Beef

Your favorite beef - perfectly seasoned and moderately salty , it will support your hand in a few hours. This single batch were collected from the best meat in the Area, so side effects are a little weaker than your typical Stalker diet .
